product_name: Sierra Designs Incognito Rain Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Despite the name, the Sierra Designs Incognito Rain Jacket for women is sure to draw positive attention at the office and around town, rain or shine. Waterproof, windproof polyester shell; polyester taffeta lining slides effortlessly over other clothes. Adjustable cuffs, adjustable/removable hood and waist drawcord customize the fit. Taped PVC-free seams keep water out. The Sierra Designs Incognito Jacket for women has 2 lower flap pockets, 2 hand pockets, 1 flap chest pocket and 1 interior zip pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Despite the name, the Sierra Designs Incognito Rain Jacket for women is sure to draw positive attention at the office and around town, rain or shine.
